Reviews.Title: “Loved this B&B”
Reviews.Author: jenbeatlesfan
Reviews.Content: I absolutely loved this hotel. The rooms were very accommodating,the beds very comfortable. David went above and beyond as hotel owner. I think a lot of hotel owners can take a cue from the way he runs his hotel. If I ever return to Rome I will definitely be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Soloroma”
Reviews.Author: Toesinthesand1966
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the yellow room. While the room is clean, it is very, very small. David is nice, helpful and welcoming. I would have appreciated knowing ahead of time about the cat living there since I am allergic to cats. Also, there is incense burning at all times. The location is close to the Vatican and to the Ottavio metro station (3 blocks).

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant and a bit special”
Reviews.Author: joen.dk
Reviews.Content: Clearly the business of a creative and quality-minded owner, this bed-and-breakfast is recommendable & I think it could be picked among the top-10 in Rome because of its originality, its location and the nice breakfast. You have a good view of St. Peter´s from your room as well as your breakfast kitchen. The building is slightly aristocratic, with a concierge, a courtyard and an old- fashioned lift. The facilities in the room are certainly above average, and its decoration will be en eye-opener, maybe even spiritually, for you, I think. The owner is friendly and efficient and his language skills are impeccable. The place is on the top floor, at the end to the right, when you leave the lift; Í don´t think it is clearly signed, however. A bargain, and centrally located indeed, as well as clean and safe. ( One review on the web states that there can be a slight smell of smoke because of the owners habits, but we didn´t experience anything like ´that at all ).
